top_comment.text:
I want to wish all of you a very Merry Christmas. If you are not Christian, 
I wish you Happy Holidays.
If you haven't heard, I will have a Christmas book come out next year. It's 
scheduled to be called "Stories of Bethlehem" and will be a collection of 
short stories that I and some other people have written. They are all 
historical fiction from the story of the birth and youth of Christ.
For this Christmas season, I am sharing one of these stories with you so 
you may share it with others as well. It is a story of the shepherds that 
were visited by the angel announcing the birth of Christ and then their 
visit to the stable.
I hope you enjoy it. Please let me know what you think of this story and 
then share with others but please let them know about the other stories 
that are coming.
Download it here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/wzy2d1y
…/A%20Shepherds%20Tale.pdf…
I am also sharing with you the Piano Guys' release of "Angels We Have Heard 
on High" with David Archuleta, Peter Hollens, The Mormon Tabernacle Choir, 
and a additional 1,000 member choir. This YouTube video is so moving.
http://youtu.be/PrLoWt2tfqg
I wish you and your family a wonderful Christmas.
All my best,
Boyd Petersen
‪#‎Jesus‬ ‪#‎Christmas‬ ‪#‎JesusChrist‬﻿
top_comment.author: Boyd Petersen

comments.text:
I encourage everyone to read this quote.

''Like ants we seem to the divine hands of the heavens above.
Like marionettes for their entertainment, toys, tools, things to be looked 
upon and laughed about, but not with a life of our own.
How paltry we must seem to the great omnipresent watch of the swirling 
spinning cosmos.
Like little scraps of garbage that blows on some unknown path in the 
blustering gales of their ''glory''.
And indeed, when you compare the age we have lived to the ancient pulse of 
''being'' around us, life does appear to be something to scoff at.

Our problems? Like teeny shells beat about in the great clash of the ocean.
Our struggles? Like the plight of an inchworm turned on its back.
Our joys? Like the joy of the air, it cannot be seen.
Our discoveries? The mere findings of a child to the ones above. And yet... 
we live on, unheeding of the celestial watch.

And yet we continue on, uncaring for the deities that spawned all from 
their very wishes.
To us, they are nothing more than legends, as we are ants to them.
Indifferent as the earth is to the sky.
We know it is there, but we pay it no mind, no heed, no care.
Gods they say, yet what right do they have that we do not? Omnipotent they 
say, bending the kingdoms of Nature's breath to their very will.

Yet what prove have you of such things? ''Gods'' we call them, and give 
them powers greater than any should ever hope to dream of.

''Lords'' we name them, and say all that dare defy these beings shall be 
damned.
We have given empty space the right to laugh upon us and tread us into the 
dirt.
We have given the throne of the sky up to things we do not understand, and 
yet they we have trusted have not abated our struggles.
Where are our gods now, when the world burns at our fingers?
Where are our gods now, when children starve and die, when the shining eyes 
of the future are put through unspeakable things?
Where are the gods that have promised us life?
Hmm?
They stand above all with uncaring thoughts, enjoying their own cruel 
entertainment.
What has become of us, when the gods do not heed our call?
They sit and they smile, never knowing of our day-to-day, loving, hating, 
loathing, beautiful, sharing, lunatic.. Existence.''
comments.author: HarHar HarHar

comments.text:
+Chef Asbury Ugh. I go on vacation for two days and come back to *this*...

Asbury, I don't care whether or not you think stupid ideas deserve 
ridicule. I don't really care about you at all. What concerns me about this 
comment thread is that we atheists already have enough people set against 
us without you handing them ammunition and making more enemies left and 
right! Nothing hurts us more than people like you! This video doesn't 
impact your life; you *chose* to watch it! Leave it be! Continuing this in 
order to spite people makes you just as bad as those on the other side who 
want to deny us our right to non-belief. If you want to talk about this 
issue, do it respectfully and in an appropriate setting; there are forums 
all over the internet for just that purpose! Jumping up and shrieking an 
insult into the wind is exactly the wrong way to go about it, particularly 
on the heels of such a lovely work of art as this.
comments.author: PoptartProdigy

comments.text:
Hop off means you have no reason to bash on our religion, so back off.
Also no, Revelation was not the last word. It was put last by councils 
later on because of it's contents. The book of Revelation was written quite 
a while before John's last epistle so by your very logic John himself would 
be damned for "adding" to the "word" of God.  The facts I gave you are 
facts, and in no way try to prove my religion but are used to show we have 
just as much reason to believe what we believe as you do. 
Further the WORD, is logos in greek. Which denotes the expression of 
thought. NOT the name of an object. It is an embodiment of an idea, a 
revelation. Then later in that verse the grammar changes slightly ,still 
logos but the concept of the logos is altered to meaning the Personal 
expression of thought as a title to the Son (Son of God) It is intended to 
be taken as the evidence of his place in the Godhead.  
Then the concept of the logos is altered to meaning the evidence of His 
power as the logos becomes possessive. 
Basically with the literal meaning of the language here it is NOT talking 
about the Bible. It is not talking about the 66 canonical works being the 
ONLY expression of Gods thought intended for man on earth having been 
spoken by Him and recorded by His prophets.That is NOT what it is, what it 
means or anything of the sort.
How it is to be understood is simply this: "In the beginning was the 
perfect expression of thought. A revelation, a plan. This plan was with God 
and this plan has power in and of itself as the plan is the embodiment of 
His son." Which we know the Savior was the plan, without Him there is 
nothing. 
The Word is more than a personification of the Savior and has no reference 
to our Bible. 
I have already stated the facts of the Bible. It is a historical 
documentation which was compiled over of the course of years. Before they 
were merely scrolls not a collective work as we see now. Therefore the 
other writings not included plus those continued writings of the 1st and 
2nd centuries should most certainly be considered as possible scripture as 
many of those epistles were written by men who were students of the 
Apostles themselves. In that light I believe it should be able to make 
things clear.
comments.author: Vox “Watson” Ratio

comments.text:
Si dejé desguarnecida mi alma,
solo por amor lo hice.
Si enmudeció mi voz bajo el abrigo del ave,
para saborear más extensión del agua clara fué.
Si por descuido mío,
me visteis arrojado, vencido,
demolido por el embate de la duda;
no lo hice reclamando vuestra piedad,
sino por el afán de hacer brotar en vosotros
la misericordia que os hiciera ricos.
He permanecido callado para escrutarme,
para serme más fiel en mi unidad.
La soledad pura, es la del espectador
en su núcleo concentrado,
la observancia de la totalidad
de Uno frente a todo.
Si a veces me he demorado en sonrisas,
fué porque un día lo dí todo por las vuestras.
Quizá sea continuador del último,
sólo un punto, desvanecido, solitario,
pero un punto al acecho que late en vuestras miradas,
en el margen de un silencio,
¡ un grito en las grietas que condenarán al muro !
Ahora, desde mi aparente muerte,
quiero descender `ese cielo´
a la altura de vuestros sueños,
para que sintais, en cromatismo ideal,
el futuro de lo que sois:
Mi deseo inalcanzable de vuestra felicidad.

(c) ADON GREEN
comments.author: Adon Green

Merry Christmas Everyone. Steven Sharp Nelson Here representing The Piano Guys
We wanted to take a minute and express our gratitude for everyone involved
in this project and All the YouTubers that brought their talent in this thing to make it possible
You got to watch this video over here its called Share the Gift
Its what all of this project has been about
and for us the christmas season is so special
We believe that the purpose of life is to be happy
and for us in our own lives
That happiness comes from following the teachings of Jesus Christ
Holding family extra close
And loving others more than ourselves.  It's not easy
But,It's so worth it. And Christmas so beautifully brings all of these three things together.
So, got out an make someone else's Christmas season extra special
By doing something anonymous for someone in need, do what ever it is
that you feel that you want to share the gift of christmas
Merry Christmas
